DOC.HEADLINE: FILMS AND PROGRAMS
DOC.TEXT: The following travel films and programs are scheduled this week : TUESDAY -- " Brazil , Argentina and Machu Picchu " is a slide show presented by Gene Mallin for the Sierra Club at the Department of Water and Power , 111 N . Hope St. , Los Angeles . 7:30 p.m. Free . ( 213 ) 664-5943 . WEDNESDAY -- " Siberia Via Trans-Siberian Railroad " is the subject of travel photographer Mort Loveman ' s lecture at Roxbury Park Auditorium , 471 S . Roxbury Drive , Beverly Hills . 1 p.m. Free . ( 310 ) 550-4761 . THURSDAY -- " The Diversity of India " is a slide-show presentation by Nino Mohan at the India Tourist Office , 3550 Wilshire Blvd . Suite 204 , Los Angeles . 6:30 p.m. Free . Reservations : ( 310 ) 630-3316 . FRIDAY -- " Holland : Land of Windmills and Canals " is a slide show by photographer M . Richard Marx at the Felicia Mahood Center , 11338 Santa Monica Blvd . Los Angeles . 1 p.m. Free . ( 310 ) 477-2084 .
